cast.name: 霍斯特·布赫霍尔茨 Horst Buchholz
马里奥·阿多夫 Mario Adorf

writer.name: 维尔纳·约尔格·吕德克 Werner Jörg Lüddecke

director.name: 乔治·特雷斯勒 Georg Tressler

introduction: After a line of mischief Philip Gale, an American sailor, is lured into hiring on the "Yorikke", a tramp cargo, by Lawski, a stoker from Poland. Still, the two become friends within the motley crew of losers from all nations. Gale and his new companion soon are more than disillusioned: the "Yorikke" is far from seaworthy and more of a coffin than a ship, work is close to slavery, and treatment by the officers and their subalterns is harsh and cynical. One day they make an alarming discovery in a tin of plum butter they have procured from the ship's cargo...
